FuncDef:
The time-range non-accounting command enables a device to stop accounting for user traffic within a specified time range.
The undo time-range non-accounting command restores the default configuration.
By default, this function is disabled.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a time range.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. It must start with an uppercase or lowercase letter. In addition, the word all cannot be specified as a time range name.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To enable a device to stop accounting for user traffic within a period of time, run the time-range non-accounting command.
Prerequisites
A time range has been configured using the time-range time-range-name command.
